st_remarks: Soil depth was dug only until 100 cm (Martins 2010). The soil depth may be greater. Percentages of sand, silt and clay for depth 0-5 cm. All soil data obtained from the PhD thesis by Martins, S.C. (2010) Caracterização dos solos e serapilheira ao longo do gradiente altitudinal da Mata Atlântica, estado de São Paulo. Doutorado, USP. Maximum canopy height is 25 m but average is 10.2 meters. Regardind slope, the site studied presents, majoritarilly, a strong slope but also flat areas and gentle slopes where some of our individuals were located
